projects.name: CRM system
projects.description: Application software for organizations, developed to automate customer interaction strategies, aiming to increase sales, optimize marketing, and improve customer service by storing information about customers and their relationship history, establishing and refining business processes, and subsequent analysis of results.

projects.name: Remote job search app
projects.description: A remote job search app that allows users to find job vacancies in various industries that offer remote work options. The app scrapes websites with job postings and extracts relevant information such as job title, job description, company name, location, and application requirements.

projects.name: Cosmetics analog search service
projects.description: Application that allows you to find a better, healthier, cheaper cosmetics by a large amount of parameters. Various data sources allow you to see cosmetics ingredients rating based on inci database, pubchem database, and a lot of different expert sources.

projects.name: Logistics service for workwear distributor
projects.description: Application with lots of integrations for a workwear distributor. Allows to improve logistics of supplies, manage employees and their business, manage maps and build routes

projects.name: VFX assets storage and integration
projects.description: Service for integration of the ShotGrid cloud asset storage into the Houdini and Maya, and various optimizations for their rendering. Contains complex math and physics algorhytms, and improved resulting performance for almost 5 times.

projects.name: Restaurants interactive menu
projects.description: Service for restaurants which contains interactive menu, overview of different restaurants in their network

projects.name: Shoe suppliers services
projects.description: Services for shoe supplier which allows to check current stocks in different warehouses, simplify different logistics, and also analyze business

projects.name: Online casino and betting service
projects.description: Services for an online casino, which include logic for customer interactions, betting services, etc.

projects.name: Educational platform
projects.description: Educational platform, which allows teachers to interact with students, store tests, video-lessons, presentations, etc.

projects.name: Telecom CRM system
projects.description: Analog of SAP CPQ service, but with much better performance and higher level of customization because of the manually written logic and order constructors.

project_services.name: users service
project_services.description: crm always must have a standalone service for user management. It has too much separate requests.

project_services.name: statistics service
project_services.description: It's useful for crm to have a standalone service for collecting all of the data.

project_services.name: integrations service
project_services.description: Usually crm has lots of integrations with different payment systems, suppliers, etc.

project_services.name: products service
project_services.description: If CRM offers something to user (always, actually), it must store all of the data in a standalone service

project_services.name: orders service
project_services.description: It depends on products service. Allows to create separate order management

project_services.name: users service
project_services.description: Allows to manage users registering, auth, etc.

project_services.name: teachers service
project_services.description: Allows to create and manage student boards, set marks, set events, etc.

project_services.name: edu service
project_services.description: Stores and manages from of interactive video-lessons, tests completion, etc.

project_services.name: supporting service
project_services.description: stores all the media data, sends notifications, etc.

project_services.name: cms engine
project_services.description: hub for all of the services, sends notifications, etc.

project_services.name: admin service
project_services.description: allows users to easily administrate their contents

project_services.name: content service
project_services.description: allows users to create content types and fill it

project_services.name: template service
project_services.description: modifies templates and allows to dynamically insert contents on it
